product_name: Sherpani Zoe Cross Body Wallet - Women's
long_description: The Sherpani Zoe Cross Body wallet is an adorable little grab-and-go wallet that can be slung over your shoulder for hands-free carrying. Slim design with zippered clamshell closure; cute floral lining adds a bit of fun. Internal elastic band secures your cell phone; includes a cash pocket, mesh change holder pocket and credit card slots. Also features a clear ID holder and a key fob. String shoulder strap. Sherpani Zoe Cross Body wallet's fabric stands up to abrasions, tears and punctures.
short_description: The Sherpani Zoe Cross Body wallet is an adorable little grab-and-go wallet that can be slung over your shoulder for hands-free carrying.
